name: Little William Run - Endless Arcade Runner 3D
name_original: Little William Run - Endless Arcade Runner 3D
description:
Addictive super mega runner Little William Run is now available for iOS exclusively! What's your highest score? Tap and swipe to turn, jump and roll to avoid hitting barriers, monkeys and buses! How crazy and fun is that?

Can you help William? He was lost while on holiday with his parents. When Little William tried to find his way to the hotel, he found a secret place, full of treasure and wonder. Unfortunately local tribes spotted him and now they want to stop him.

Run as fast as you can and collect most of the coins and other goodies. Super fun game!

Features:

- Dodge oncoming vehicles in this wonderful endless running game
- Beautiful and incredible graphics
- Wonderful and exotic and stunning 3D environments
- Cool obstacles and Powerups
- Use William's abilities to dodge hazards, pitfalls and jump over and under barriers
- Easy to start playing so it is a game for all ages

New:
- Tutorial when you start playing first time

What reviewers say:

"Runner like no other. Totally immersive. Can't stop playing" – Eric Masta

Download now to experience exhilarating running, jumping, rolling and sliding!

For mobile and tablet. FREE to play.
